Hello, I am Hasanur

After a long period of poor health, I begun to reevaluate what I wanted in life. That reflection led to the reigniting of my passion for Computer Science.

Right now I am focused on exploring the foundations of Computing by peeling away at abstraction layers and really understanding how things work using first principles thinking.

Areas I’m actively researching:

  • GPU Programming
  • Computer Architecture

You can find a more detailed breakdown of what I’m working on here.

You can follow my progress here:

  • Linkedin

“Real understanding begins where the abstractions end.”
